author: Frances Martel, Frances Martel
title: Chinese Media to 'Stupid U.S. Politicians': 'Just Shut Up'
description: China's Global Times propaganda newspaper published a piece on Monday by an alleged Chinese "professor" repeatedly referring to critics of the Communist Party as "stupid" for noting that China provided fraudulent Wuhan coronavirus data to the world.
content:
China’s Global Times propaganda newspaper published a piece on Monday by an alleged Chinese “professor” repeatedly referring to critics of the Communist Party as “stupid” for noting that China provided fraudulent Wuhan coronavirus data to the world.
